amendment.description: Amendment sought to maintain MIECHV's current focus of funding evidence-based home visiting programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-331 to maintain MIECHV's current focus of funding evidence-based home visiting programs that strengthen families to make kids healthier, safer, and more ready to learn when they start school by striking the provision in the bill that would add `increasing employment and earnings' to the program's measured outcomes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 231 (Roll no. 535).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pascrell.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 231 (Roll no. 535).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
